  <!-- ====== About Us Section ====== -->
<section class="about-section py-5 bg-light">
  <div class="container">
    <!-- About -->
    <div class="row align-items-center mb-5">
      <div class="col-lg-6">
        <img src="assets/img/banner/banner-two.jpg" class="img-fluid rounded-3 shadow" alt="AIERP Partners Office">
      </div>
      <div class="col-lg-6">
        <h2 class="fw-bold mb-3 text-primary">About Us</h2>
        <p class="lead text-muted">
          At <strong>AIERP Partners</strong>, we go beyond technology delivery — we enable true digital transformation. 
          Headquartered in Miami, we combine Big4-quality consulting with the agility of a modern IT services firm, helping businesses unlock 
          the AI inside SAP and Oracle to achieve efficiency, intelligence, and growth.
        </p>
        <p>
          We are not just implementers; we are strategic partners who align technology with business outcomes. From ERP implementation 
          and migration to AI-powered automation and custom application development, every solution we deliver creates measurable value 
          for your organization.
        </p>
      </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Vision & Mission -->
    <div class="row text-center mb-5">
      <div class="col-md-6 mb-4">
        <div class="p-4 rounded-4 shadow-sm bg-white h-100">
          <i class="fa-solid fa-eye fa-2x text-primary mb-3"></i>
          <h4 class="fw-bold">Our Vision</h4>
          <p class="text-muted">
            To make enterprise-grade consulting and AI-driven ERP innovation accessible to every business, 
            empowering organizations to transform operations, accelerate decision-making, and achieve sustainable growth.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="col-md-6 mb-4">
        <div class="p-4 rounded-4 shadow-sm bg-white h-100">
          <i class="fa-solid fa-bullseye fa-2x text-primary mb-3"></i>
          <h4 class="fw-bold">Our Mission</h4>
          <p class="text-muted">
            Deliver consulting services with the rigor and quality of Big4 firms, at the speed and flexibility modern businesses need — 
            unlocking AI in ERP to turn systems into intelligent business platforms.
          </p>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Our Experts -->
    <div class="row align-items-center mb-5">
      <div class="col-lg-6 order-lg-2">
        <img src="assets/img/banner/banner-one.webp" class="img-fluid rounded-3 shadow" alt="Our Experts">
      </div>
      <div class="col-lg-6 order-lg-1">
        <h2 class="fw-bold mb-3 text-primary">Our Experts</h2>
        <p class="text-muted">
          What sets us apart is our people. Our consulting team includes professionals who have worked directly with SAP, Oracle, 
          and leading OEMs — bringing deep product knowledge and proven industry experience.
        </p>
        <p>
          With backgrounds in top consulting firms and global ERP rollouts, our experts combine strategy and delivery to ensure 
          every engagement is both technically sound and business-aligned.
        </p>
      </div>
    </div>

    <!-- Why Choose Us -->
    <div class="text-center mb-5">
      <h2 class="fw-bold mb-4 text-primary">Why Choose Us</h2>
      <div class="row g-4">
        <div class="col-md-4">
          <div class="p-4 rounded-4 shadow-sm bg-white h-100">
            <i class="fa-solid fa-award fa-2x text-primary mb-3"></i>
            <h5 class="fw-bold">Big4-Quality Consulting</h5>
            <p class="text-muted">Combining enterprise-level expertise with startup agility from Miami.</p>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-md-4">
          <div class="p-4 rounded-4 shadow-sm bg-white h-100">
            <i class="fa-solid fa-robot fa-2x text-primary mb-3"></i>
            <h5 class="fw-bold">ERP + AI Specialization</h5>
            <p class="text-muted">Experts in SAP and Oracle solutions empowered by artificial intelligence.</p>
          </div>
        </div>
        <div class="col-md-4">
          <div class="p-4 rounded-4 shadow-sm bg-white h-100">
            <i class="fa-solid fa-handshake fa-2x text-primary mb-3"></i>
            <h5 class="fw-bold">Outcome-Driven Partnership</h5>
            <p class="text-muted">Focused on measurable ROI, transparency, and long-term value creation.</p>
          </div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</section>

  <script src=" https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/popper.js@1.16.0/dist/umd/popper.min.js "
    integrity=" sha384-Q6E9RHvbIyZFJoft+2mJbHaEWldlvI9IOYy5n3zV9zzTtmI3UksdQRVvoxMfooAo " crossorigin=""></script>
  <script src="assets/js/jquery/jquery-3.7.1.min.js"></script>
  <script src="assets/js/main.js"></script>
    <script>
        document.getElementById('toggleBtn').addEventListener('click', function() {
            const projectDetails = document.getElementById('projectDetails');
            const button = document.getElementById('toggleBtn');
            
            if (projectDetails.style.display === 'none' || projectDetails.style.display === '') {
                projectDetails.style.display = 'block';
                button.textContent = 'Hide Project Details';
            } else {
                projectDetails.style.display = 'none';
                button.textContent = 'Show Project Details';
            }
        });
    </script>
</body>

If you want to opt-out, please contact web hosting support.</script><script src='https://img1.wsimg.com/traffic-assets/js/tccl.min.js'></script></html>
